name: Roo.tree.TreeSorter
desc: Provides sorting of nodes in a TreePanel

config.name: folderSort
config.desc: True to sort leaf nodes under non leaf nodes

config.name: leafAttr
config.desc: The attribute used to determine leaf nodes in folder sort (defaults to "leaf")

config.name: caseSensitive
config.desc: true for case sensitive sort (defaults to false)

config.name: dir
config.desc: The direction to sort (asc or desc) (defaults to asc)

config.name: sortType
config.desc: A custom "casting" function used to convert node values before sorting

config.name: property
config.desc: The named attribute on the node to sort by (defaults to text)
